title: Sri Lanka is now one country, my aim is to see whole nation gets all benefits: President Rajapaksa
content: ‘I have a political solution in mind, it must be acceptable to political parties and the people’; TNA’s giving up separate state demand is ‘a very good development’; Tamil people ‘want a new leadership to be built up’; elections to Northern Provincial Council ‘by next year’; a priority is to ‘win the hearts and minds’…
